snippet.title: Mandragora - Coming April 17th, 2025
snippet.description:
Mandragora is now available for preorder on PC together with an exciting Digital Deluxe Edition. Adventurers can look forward to exclusive content and the opportunity to delve into the dark fantasy world before the official release. In two extensive PC preview phases,one in November and the second expected in February, preorder holders will be able to experience handpicked parts of the game and help make Mandragora an outstanding gaming experience.


Mandragora
Mandragora (Full Game: April 17th, 2025)
Preview #1 Access
Preview #2 Access (Early 2025)
Preorder-Armor-Cosmetic-Set & Preorder Pet Follower
Additional Quest

Mandragora - Digital Deluxe Edition
all Preorder benefits, including both playable Previews 
Deluxe-Armor-Cosmetic-Set & Deluxe-Pet Follower
Digital Orchestral OST
Digital Artbook 

The Mandragora and Mandragora - Digital Deluxe Edition will be available to preorder from November 20th on Steam and Epic Games Store for Windows-PC. Further details on the exclusive preorder content of the Mandragora and Digital Deluxe Edition as well as on Mandragora for consoles will be revealed soon.


PREORDER ON PC TO START PLAYING NOW:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1721060/Mandragora/
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/p/mandragora-36280a
